question: Which country is the most stable country/the least fragile country in the world, according to the Fragile States Index, 2020?
explanation: Finland is the most stable country/the least fragile country in the world, according to the Fragile States Index, 2020. Fragile States Index, formerly Failed States Index, is an annual report published by the United States think tank the "Fund for Peace". It rates countries based on their brittleness through factors of risk, compiled by the Fund for Peace, such as demographic pressures, human flight, economic decline, and public services. Finland is the only country in the "Very Sustainable" category of the ranking.
